name: Chocolate Coconut Donut
description: A delightful donut dipped in rich chocolate glaze and generously sprinkled with sweet, shredded coconut.

name: Chocolate Fudge Donut
description: An intensely rich donut topped with a decadent chocolate fudge icing, perfect for serious chocolate lovers.

name: Chocolate Marble Donut
description: A visually appealing donut with a beautiful swirl of chocolate and vanilla icing, offering a classic flavor combination.

name: Chocolate Sprinkle Donut
description: A classic favorite! Soft donut glazed with rich chocolate and covered in colorful, fun sprinkles.

name: Coconut Jam Donut
description: A fluffy donut filled with sweet fruit jam and generously coated in shredded coconut for a tropical twist.

name: Coffee Fudge Donut
description: A sophisticated donut featuring a rich coffee-infused fudge icing, perfect for a morning or afternoon pick-me-up.

name: Double Chocolate Donut
description: Indulge in ultimate chocolate bliss with this donut, featuring a chocolate dough and a rich chocolate glaze.

name: Lemon Donut
description: A zesty and refreshing donut with a tangy lemon glaze or filling, offering a bright burst of citrus flavor.

name: Lotus Donut
description: An irresistible donut topped with creamy Lotus Biscoff spread and crunchy Biscoff cookie crumbles.

name: Nutella Hazelnut Donut
description: A dream come true! Fluffy donut generously filled or topped with creamy Nutella and sprinkled with toasted hazelnuts.

name: Oreo Donut
description: A crowd-pleasing donut featuring a creamy glaze and topped with crushed Oreo cookie pieces for a delightful crunch.

name: Original Glazed Donut
description: The timeless classic! A light and airy donut covered in a perfectly sweet, signature glaze.

name: Plain Donut
description: A simple, soft, and slightly sweet plain donut, perfect on its own or for dipping in your favorite beverage.

name: Strawbery Icing Donut
description: A sweet and fruity donut topped with a vibrant pink strawberry-flavored icing, often with sprinkles.

name: Vanilla Coconut Donut
description: A delightful donut with a sweet vanilla glaze, generously coated with shredded coconut for a tropical touch.

name: Vanilla Icing Donut
description: A classic donut topped with a smooth and sweet vanilla icing, a simple and satisfying treat.

name: Vanilla Marbel Donut
description: An elegant donut featuring a beautiful swirl of vanilla and another complementary icing, offering a classic sweet flavor.

name: Walnut Fudge Donut
description: A rich donut topped with decadent chocolate fudge icing and generously sprinkled with crunchy walnuts.

name: White Smiley Donut
description: Bring a smile to your face with this fun donut, featuring a white icing base and a cheerful smiley face design.

name: Yellow Smiley Donut
description: A bright and cheerful donut with a sunny yellow icing base and an adorable smiley face design. Perfect for kids and kids at heart!
